sections.summary:
A current sophomore majoring in sociology whom enjoys working and interacting with people. Technologically savvy, a quick learner, and a strong
work ethic ensures great leadership as well as a great team member. Always willing to put best effort into work to accomplish goals with a friendly
and positive attitude that contributes to a pleasant work environment.Â
